headline: VeriSign, Inc. (VRSN): A Top Tech Stock in Warren Buffett’s Diversified Portfolio
summary: We recently published a list of Warren Buffett’s 10 Longest-Held Stocks. In this article, we are going to take a look at where VeriSign, Inc. (NASDAQ:VRSN) stands against other Warren Buffett’s longest-held stocks. Warren Buffett has cemented his legacy as Wall Street’s most successful investor.
